snippet: Reducing the trade deficit would lead to more growth.
abstract: Op-Ed article by policy experts Jared Bernstein and Dean Baker contends reducing the budget deficit will not increase economic growth and job creation; holds America's real problem is its trade imbalance; calls on shifting the focus of economic debate accordingly.

byline.original: By JARED BERNSTEIN and DEAN BAKER

lead_paragraph: Reducing the trade deficit would lead to more growth.

headline.main: Taking Aim at the Wrong Deficit
headline.print_headline: Taking Aim at the Wrong Deficit
